isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - SUN SHADE

svcsubproc.title: Install Sun Shade on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 27 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position sun shade (Item 5) at sun shade mounting bracket (Item 7) and connect sun shade connector (Item 11) to wiring harness connector (Item 9) coming from wiring harness hole (Item 10) in sun shade mounting bracket.

Position sun shade (Item 5) on the sun shade mounting bracket (Item 7) bonded to cab roof (Item 8). Install three hex flanged head mounting screws (Item 6) through clearance light openings and attach sun shade to sun shade mounting bracket. Tighten to 34 to 38 Lbf-ft (46 to 52 N•m).

Position right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Items 2 and 3) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 4) onto sun shade (Item 5) and install two self-tapping screws (Item 1) for each clearance light, attaching them to sun shade. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
